title: glib fails to build on OS X
body:
This might be related to: https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/1517#issuecomment-239710073, https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/1455#issuecomment-239507716, https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/1041#issuecomment-238363551

But, I get a failure when attempting to build glib on Mac OS X 10.11.6:

```
==> Building glib
==> Error: Command exited with status 2:
'make' '-j8'

See build log for details:
  /private/var/folders/vr/7lfgcgzd0wb4brywdhg86ygw00157w/T/lee1001/spack-stage/spack-stage-QAjlc9/glib-2.49.4/spack-build.out

/Users/lee1001/projs/llnl/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/glib/package.py:57, in install:
     55       def install(self, spec, prefix):
     56           configure("--prefix=%s" % prefix)
  >> 57           make()
     58           make("install", parallel=False)
==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code : 256
```

And the last bit of that log is:

```
2 warnings generated.
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gerror.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gfileutils.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-ggettext.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-ghash.lo
1 warning generated.
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-ghmac.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-ghook.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-ghostutils.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-giochannel.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gkeyfile.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-glib-init.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-glib-private.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-glist.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gmain.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gmappedfile.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gmarkup.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gmem.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gmessages.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gnode.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-goption.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gpattern.lo
  CC       libglib_2_0_la-gpoll.lo
gmessages.c:1446:53: error: format string is not a string literal [-Werror,-Wformat-nonliteral]
      size = _g_vsnprintf (buffer, sizeof (buffer), format, args);
                                                    ^~~~~~
/usr/include/secure/_stdio.h:75:63: note: expanded from macro 'vsnprintf'
  __builtin___vsnprintf_chk (str, len, 0, __darwin_obsz(str), format, ap)
                                                              ^
gmessages.c:1451:55: error: format string is not a string literal [-Werror,-Wformat-nonliteral]
      message = message_allocated = g_strdup_vprintf (format, args);
                                                      ^~~~~~
2 errors generated.
make[4]: *** [libglib_2_0_la-gmessages.lo] Error 1
make[4]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[2]: *** [all] Error 2
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
